item.title: My First Post
item.description: How to Easily Build a Blog Using Hugo and Github Pages This is my first blog trip. In this post, I’d like to share the specific steps that I performed to build my personal blog using Hugo and Github Pages. And the article refers to many previous tutorials on the Internet. Let’s start! ​ Step 1: Install Hugo Refer to the official Hugo installation guide and get prepared.
